amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to clarify existing authorities may be utilized to prevent wildfires in Fire Regimes IV and V which are located in Colorado, Wyoming, New Mexico, Arizona, California, Utah, Nevada, Oregon, Idaho, Montana, Michigan, Minnesota, Wisconsin, New York, Maine, West Virginia, New Jersey, Rhode Island, Missouri, Louisiana, Mississippi, Indiana, Ohio, Vermont, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, Virginia, North Carolina, Iowa, Florida, and Texas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
